---
name: Add Posts/Feed System
about: Implement a feed system for clubs to share updates and announcements
title: "Feature: Posts and Feed System"
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## Description
Implement a social feed system that allows clubs and members to share announcements, updates, and engage with other members.

## New Features
- Activity feed showing club announcements and updates
- Post creation for club admins and members
- Comment functionality on posts
- Like/reaction system for engagement
- Feed filtering and sorting options

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Posts can be created by authorized club members
- [ ] Feed displays posts in chronological order
- [ ] Comments and reactions functional
- [ ] Posts can be edited/deleted by creators
- [ ] Feed is searchable and filterable
